item.title: 6 Crazy Superstitions From Around the World
item.description: Objective: Create a short “viral video” based on one of the most common viral formats. My role: Director, scenario writer, editor, actor. Duration: 1 semester (3 months). Tools used: Sony digital video camera, Adobe Premiere, Adobe Illustrator. Skills used: Writing, storyboarding, visual storytelling, video directing, video editing. Every country and culture has its own quirky beliefs. Many Canadians fear the number 13, and in China it’s taboo to give a clock as a gift.
